channel.title: Install on Posters by Sungpil Han
channel.description: Recent content in Install on Posters by Sungpil Han

item.title: Installation
item.description: Create a Hugo site If you haven’t created a Hugo site yet, use the following command: hugo new site <name> Replace the <name> with whatever you want to name your site’s repository. Alright, now enter the site’s root folder: cd <name> Okay, now it’s time for installing Minimo! Installing Minimo There are two different ways you can install Minimo: As clone As submodule The second method is suggested.
